name: pnp-list-formatting-honeycomb-link
title: Honeycomb Links
shortDescription: Formats links to look like honeycombs!
longDescription: This sample demonstrates a honeycomb structure of links. The hexagons are displayed using SVG, so that five hexagons are displayed per line. This sample uses the Icons from the Fluent UI. The name of the icon is referenced through an Icon field.

references.name: Use view formatting to customize SharePoint
references.description: You can use view formatting to customize how items in SharePoint lists and libraries are displayed. To do this, you construct a JSON object that describes the elements that are displayed when an item is loaded in a view and any styles to be applied to those elements.
